name: SCNChamferMode
desc: Options for which edges of an extruded shape are chamfered, used by the chamferMode property.

items.name: case both
items.desc: Apply a chamfer to both front and back edges of the extruded shape.

items.name: case front
items.desc: Apply a chamfer to only the front edge of the extruded shape.

items.name: case back
items.desc: Apply a chamfer to only the back edge of the extruded shape.
